attributes.additional_details:
In tier 2 or 3 restriction areas, or the equivalent, schools should move to learning online, in particular for secondary aged children
To minimise contact and the potential spread of Covid between the asymptomatic demographic.
Appease concerns and therefore aid mental health of the wider public
attributes.background: With exceptions for childcare reasons, the most vulnerable and key workers. This should be substantial and monitored but reducing the amount of students in school has to be better than a complete closure.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Suspend fines for school non-attendance during Covid-19 & allow parental choice: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551740

Require schools to support home learning during Covid-19 outbreak: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334065
